description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于美国安局间谍计划遭质疑的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注美国安局间谍计划遭质疑的情况！

CONTENT：

Top U.S.intelligence officials said on Saturday that information gleaned from two controversial data-collection programs run by the National Security Agency thwarted potential terrorist plots in theU.S.and more than 20 other countries - and that gathered data is destroyed every five years.
Last year, fewer than 300 phone numbers were checked against the database of millions ofU.S.phone records gathered daily by the NSA in one of the programs, the intelligence officials said in arguing that the programs are far less sweeping than their detractors allege.
No other new details about the plots or the countries involved were part of the newly declassified information released to Congress on Saturday and made public by the Senate Intelligence Committee.

KEYWORDS：

1. glean
vt. 收集（资料）；拾（落穗）；查清，查明
vi. 收集；拾落穗
eg.
1） I could not glean what she really want to do.
我弄不清楚她究竟想做什么。
2) The old woman spent three hours gleaning in the wheat field.
老妇花了三小时在麦地里拾落穗。
2. thwart
vt. 挫败；反对；阻碍；横过
adj. 横放的；固执的
n. 划手座；独木舟的横梁
adv. 横过
prep. 横过
eg.
1）We successfully thwarted the enemy's conspiracy.
我们成功地挫败了敌人的阴谋。
2）We should care for them and not thwart their enthusiasm.
我们应该关心和爱护他们，而不是阻碍他么的积极性。
3. detractor
n. 诋毁者，毁誉者，贬低者
eg.
1） But the pipe has one major detractor: It's something of a black box.
但是，管道有个大缺点：它像是黑箱子。
2） But for every fan there is a detractor, critical not just of the monastery's approach but Shi's own lifestyle.
有一个粉丝，就会有一个批评者。 人们不仅批评少林寺的经营方式，还批评释本人的生活方式。

【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！
轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

Top U.S. intelligence officials said on Saturday that information gleaned from two controversial data-collection programs run by the National Security Agency thwarted potential terrorist plots in theU.S.and more than 20 other countries - and that gathered data is destroyed every five years.
美国高级情报官员在周六表示，从美国国家安全局运行的两个具争议性项目中收集到的信息粉碎了美国以及其他二十几个国家中的潜在恐怖阴谋。这些收集到的数据每五年销毁一次。
Last year, fewer than 300 phone numbers were checked against the database of millions ofU.S.phone records gathered daily by the NSA in one of the programs, the intelligence officials said in arguing that the programs are far less sweeping than their detractors allege.
去年，在美国国家安全局所运行的一个项目中，每日收集到数以百万计的电话记录数据库，被审查的与之要求不符合的电话号码不到300个。面对争论，情报官员表示，这两个项目的影响远不如诋毁者宣称的那么严重。
No other new details about the plots or the countries involved were part of the newly declassified information released to Congress on Saturday and made public by the Senate Intelligence Committee.
周六由参议院情报委员会向国会和公众公开的新解密的部分信息中，并未包括关于恐怖分子的阴谋以及所涉及的国家。 

参考译文2：

Top U.S. intelligence officials said on Saturday that information gleaned from two controversial data-collection programs run by the National Security Agency thwarted potential terrorist plots in theU.S.and more than 20 other countries - and that gathered data is destroyed every five years.
美国高级情报官员称，在周六，从美国国家安全局所运行的两个具有争议的项目中所收集到的信息协助挫败了在美国及其他超过二十个国家中所潜藏的恐怖阴谋，这些在项目中所收集到的数据每五年销毁一次。
Last year, fewer than 300 phone numbers were checked against the database of millions of U.S.phone records gathered daily by the NSA in one of the programs, the intelligence officials said in arguing that the programs are far less sweeping than their detractors allege.
去年，在美国国家安全局所运行的一个项目中，美国数以百万计的每日的电话录音中接近三百个电话号码在数据库中被核查，情报官员称这个项目的影响远不如恶意诋毁者所指控的那么严重。
No other new details about the plots or the countries involved were part of the newly declassified information released to Congress on Saturday and made public by the Senate Intelligence Committee.
在情报委员会于周六向国会提交并公开的新的解密信息中，并没有提及有关恐怖阴谋的新细节和所涉及的国家。

参考译文3：

Top U.S. intelligence officials said on Saturday that information gleaned from two controversial data-collection programs run by the National Security Agency thwarted potential terrorist plots in theU.S.and more than 20 other countries - and that gathered data is destroyed every five years.
周六美国高级情报官员称由美国国家安全局从两个有争议的数据收集方案中收集的信息挫败了美国以及其他超过20个的国家中潜在的恐怖阴谋。这些收集到的数据每五年都会销毁清理一次。
Last year, fewer than 300 phone numbers were checked against the database of millions of U.S.phone records gathered daily by the NSA in one of the programs, the intelligence officials said in arguing that the programs are far less sweeping than their detractors allege.
去年，对照美国国家安全局在其中一个方案中每日收集的数以百万计的美国电话记录数据库，经检查的电话号码少于300个。情报官员说，真的要计较起来，这个方案远没有他们的批评者声称的那么全面。
No other new details about the plots or the countries involved were part of the newly declassified information released to Congress on Saturday and made public by the Senate Intelligence Committee.
周六由参议院情报委员会向国会以及公众公开的新解密信息的一部分中没有阴谋的其他细节或是国家涉及其中。

title: 标准美音模仿秀：121030 运动缓解大选压力(2/2)

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Mornight

25秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

We've had more than ten years of double-digit growth in commodities prices. China has experienced industrial expansion on a speed and on a scale never before seen and it's created a vast hunger for raw materials. But now Chinese growth is slowing and commodity prices have begun to falter and even fall. And the companies producing the raw materials for China's boom time are now looking ahead and wondering what future profits will look like.十多年来我们的商品价格都是以两位数在不断增长。中国曾以从未有过的速度和规模实现了工业扩张，并大量刺激了原材料的需求。但目前，中国经济增长在放缓，商品价格开始踌躇不前甚至倒退。曾经在中国经济繁盛时期提供原材料的公司现在也继续前行，寻找未来的利润点。

commodity[kə'mɒdɪtɪ]

title: BBC模仿秀：☆130708 近距离看鲸背山铁矿

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

歌手介绍：

M2M（窈窕美眉）是由两个来自挪威的小女孩Marit（乖乖美眉--玛丽特）以及Marion（好动美眉--玛丽安）所组成的团体，由于两个人的名字都是以M开头，所以就叫M2M。Marit和Marion认识于1990年（大约五岁时），由于对音乐的喜爱，两人成为了好朋友，并常在一起为家人朋友表演。她们的第一张专辑是八岁时以挪威语灌录的儿童专辑，这张专辑也获得Spillemaspriest（相当于挪威格莱美奖）《最佳儿童专辑》提名。当时她们的团名是Marit & Marion。最终于2002年解散。

The day you went away -- M2M

模唱片段：

Well I wonder could it be ?
When I was dreaming about you baby.
You were dreaming of me.
Call me crazy.
Call me blind.
To still be suffering is stupid after all of this time.
Did I lose my love to someone better.
And does she love you like I do.
I do,you know I really really do.
Well hey.
So much I need to say.
Been lonely since the day.
The day you went away.
So sad but true.
For me there's only you.
Been crying since the day.
The day you went away.

description:
《美剧天坛秀》节目是沪江部落一档模仿类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语水平，在轻松看美剧的同时锻炼大家的口语能力。积极参与的童鞋还会得到主持的专业点评哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

原录音：

原文：God, I love money.
I know, I'm so sorry it broke up with you.
Look! This week's new Ipad just came out.
Spread the words.
Word.
Word.
I saw that on the wire.
Max, three weeks in a row,
you have not yet accepted my request to be a Facebook friend.
Max? I am talking to you.
Oh I didn't hear you, I have my earbuds in.

重点单词发音讲解：

spread
英[spred] 美[sprɛd]
v. 散播，散布
n. 传播；散布；扩展
 
wire
英[waɪə ] 美[waɪr]
n. 金属丝；电线；电报
v. 给…装电线；拍电报
 
request
英[rɪˈkwɛst] 美[rɪˈkwɛst ]
v. 要求，请求；请求给予
n. 要求，请求，需要，需求，申请书
 
earbud
英[iɚbəd] 美[iɚbəd]
耳塞

title: 美剧天天秀：130706 破产姐妹 S01E03(1)

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

Background:
“穷忙族”（Working Poor）这类人群最早出现于上世纪90年代的美国，指一群拼命工作仍然无法摆脱最低水准生活的人们。
网友给出国内“穷忙族”的新标准：1. 一周工作超过54小时，但是看不到前途；2.一年内未曾加薪；3.三年内未曾升职； 4.薪水很低到月底总是很艰难；5.积蓄少无力置产；6.工资不低但花钱很多；7.收入不低但内心没有安全感。不少网友表示自己躺枪了。

话题：

1) What do you think are the causes of Working Poor?
2) If you are a student, what measures can you take to avoid becoming working poor in the future?
3) If you are working now, do you think yourself a working poor? If yes, how to make a change?

范例1：

I have graduated from university and been working for about three years. And I had changed my job twice in order to find a satisfactory position and get a handsome salary. However, you can’t have the cake and eat it too.
Even though I majored in English, I found that I had to start everything new and to keep learning since my second job relates to manufacture industry. And what I have learned is anything but what I have got from university. So, I think, the traditional view that it is all right for you to stop studies after you are not a student any more is nonsense.
But I have to conclude that it is worth your while to persist in a life long learning. 

范例2：

       When the word “Working Poor” occurs to me, I, as a college student who haven’t leave the campus, think of those young graduates who work hard but get low  salaries. Facing this phenomenon, I consider that something should be done.
       First of all, destination. While we are still studying in campus, it is essential for us to establish a clear goal. As a result, we will know what we are studying hard for at least. In addition, determination. This is for those graduates who are standing at the cross of the multiple choices. Just make a determination to choose a job which fits yourselves best but not be chosen by the jobs. Last but not the least, deliberation. It is of great significance to hold a relaxed and positive attitude during working hours.
       God helps those who help themselves. “Working Poor” will never point to the people who obey the three “D”s

title: 英文天天写：130516 你是穷忙族吗？

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？

去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：唔哈哈哈哈哈哈

30秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

The president reacted to the comments on a television talk show. He noted that in two thousand eight, forty seven percent of voters did not choose him. But in Mr. Obama's words, "One of the things I've learned as president is you represent the entire country." 

奥巴马总统在一次电视谈话节目中回应了这些言论。他指出，2008年有47%的选民没有选择他。但用奥巴马的话来说，“作为总统，我知道的一件事是你代表整个国家。” 

重点单词发音讲解：

comment /ˈkɑ:ˌmɛnt/
talk /ˈtɑ:k/
note /ˈnoʊt/
percent /pɚˈsɛnt/
voter /ˈvoʊtɚ/
represent /ˌrɛprɪˈzɛnt/  

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
